properties.author: Guy Rixon
properties.title: Maven-1 plug-in for download pages: overview

section.name: Overview
section.p: This plug-in generates a Maven report that is a download page for the AstroGrid component in whose build the report is generated.

The page contains a link to the artifact identified by the POM. The link always points to AstroGrid's Maven-1 repository at http://www.astrogrid.org/maven/, but the group identifier, artifact type, artifact identifier and version can all be varied to suit the project. The artifact type must be set explictly using a property of this plug-in, but the other variables are set automatically from the POM. The report is put in the file DOWNLOAD.xml in the directory identified by ${maven.gen.docs}.
Using the plug-in avoids the need either to hard-code the version of the artifact in the source of the download page, or to add code to maven.xml to write the version.

tr.td: Sets the type of artifact (jar, war, etc.) to which the download link points. The value must be in lower case. Do not prepend a dot: e.g. write war not .war.
Yes, but the correct value is not inferred from the POM.
